website_summaries.verdict: A solid mid-range priced toothbrush that both buyers and their dentists recommend.
pros: Many buyers say their dentists notice the change when they switch to this model
A high-quality choice with long-lasting battery that leaves buyers' mouths feeling great
cons: Some note that this toothbrush runs rough and excessively vibrates
There have been issues with this option breaking down or not holding a charge after a few months

customer_reviews.title: choose carefully!
customer_reviews.text: While it's better than a manual toothbrush it's also 100x more expensive. Compared to my old Sonicare flexcare that died after 8 years, this one does not remember settings - it always starts on high and it does not allow you to disable the quadpacer feature, which may be a selling point but I just so happen that I hate being zapped and beeped at while brushing my teeth! Warning: AMAZON WILL NOT ALLOW YOU TO RETURN THE ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Works great but not durable
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush works great. No question that it gets my teeth cleaner than a manual toothbrush, and I tried another brand of sonic toothbrush once and it didn't have the power of Sonicare. Having said that, they don't build these things to last. This is about the fourth Sonicare I've owned, and this one is dying. I looked up my order history and found that this one lasted two years, and the previous one three years. In sum, great quality but consider it disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Don

customer_reviews.title: We love using this and are getting great results
customer_reviews.text: We love using this and are getting great results. One thing we learned was that you shouldn't rest in on the charger at night as that reduces the battery life dramatically. Instead, we just sit them on their flat bottoms on the counter and wait until the charge light is barely blinking (usually 4-5 weeks) and then put them on the charger overnight and you are good to go for another month.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Schulman

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all cost
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good electric toothbrush, this one is not it. I have purchased three Sonicares for my family in the last year, and two of them have been faulty. They turn on all by themselves, usually in the middle of the night. I go to the Philip’s site for help, and they inform me that the unit is out of warranty, however, I can get 30% off of my next purchase...no thank you! Avoid purchasing such a piece of junk. Perhaps I will have better luck with an Oral-B.
customer_reviews.author: PJR

customer_reviews.title: great for travel, stays clean
customer_reviews.text: I had the OralB toothbrush, and while I liked having an electric brush, the base got so dirty and gunky all the time. I was cleaning it every day and it was still gross. One of my friends had a different philips care (the fancier one) and recommended them in general. I liked how lightweight and travel friendly they were, and they seemed to stay cleaner. I ordered this less expensive version on black friday, and I'm glad I did. I like it a lot so far! It stays clean, holds a charge a long time, and is perfectly good at cleaning my teeth. I don't feel like I need the extra features on the fancier one.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Very highly recommended excellent in every way
customer_reviews.text: Must have if you care about oral hygiene. This is the ultimate toothbrush that actually has measurable and visible results within days of beginning to use it irrespective of what toothpaste you use with it. This is the only oral hygiene product that I ever purchased which actually does exactly what it says that it will do for you health-wise. I highly recommend it over any other manual toothbrush or electric toothbrush or any other type of rinse solution or toothpaste that advertises some significant health benefit within days of use- this is the only Oral Care device that I ever purchased that truly lives up to its claims.
customer_reviews.author: ASU

customer_reviews.title: No better brand of toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older Sonicare that was starting to have problems with the on/off button. This toothbrush is much faster than my old one and does a good job. I've always had trouble with tarter building up especially when I sleep because of breathing through my mouth when I sleep. It took the dentist over an hour to do a 6 month cleaning on me when I used a regular toothbrush and flossed. Now it only takes about 20 to 30 minutes since switching to a Sonicare. I don't care what anybody says, Sonicare is the best toothbrush and it will take a lot to make me ever change to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Malayo

customer_reviews.title: Just an Overpriced vibrating Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: OK, my mistake in buying!! I wanted to replace a waterpik which was my dentist's recommendation a few years ago. At the price for the Sonicare ...I expected so much more. It is merely a vibrating toothbrush with much too small a brush. I thought that with the name "Sonic... and at the high price it would have some sort of high frequency sound wave, i.e. ultrasound cleaning to reduce plaque. Was I wrong. Just a vibrating toothbrush. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: its non returnable!
customer_reviews.text: This item is NON returnable. the brush head is way too small. I suppose I could order a bigger brush head. but its also very strong pulse . I didn't know it was non returnable.!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. My husband and I switched from manual ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. My husband and I switched from manual to the sonicare 8 months ago. At our last check up, the dentist informed him, unprompted, that his gums looked much better compared to photos from our last visit. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mander84

customer_reviews.title: Great for gum and tooth care
customer_reviews.text: I thought I knew how to brush my teeth before I received this - clearly I was wrong. I was brushing too hard, wearing away at my gums gradually and still missing food particles where they hid. I wish I would have bought this years ago. This wonder of oral hygiene cleans every surface, massages the gums, and within a week my mouth felt better. There's a little bit of an adjustment period to learn how to position to avoid vibrations, like on the roof of my mouth. (It feels really weird there especially.) Just wet the toothbrush, add toothpaste, insert into your mouth, turn on, and brush all surfaces until the brush turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Goth Gone Grey

customer_reviews.title: Effective, hasn't broken down yet
customer_reviews.text: I made the switch to a electric toothbrush to see if it would help clean my teeth better. It does appear to do a better job that just manually brushing. I keep it at the highest setting but I wish it was a little stronger. A single charge lasts a while. Overall, I'm very impressed with the quality. I'm usually apprehensive about the quality of items sold on Amazon since they always seem to break down after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah S.

customer_reviews.title: No Longer working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from amazon about 2 years ago. It longer works correctly. The unit is on, but the vibration is almost not existent once I start brushing my teeth. I called Sonicare customer service and they said it is out of warranty. All that they can do is send me a 20%off coupon. This coupon is only to be used at the Phillips store where the prices are more than 20% higher than Amazons price. Good thing I only paid 80 some dollars for it and not more for the diamond series. Buyer beware! This does not last. Get a cheaper model so you are not out the $$ when is fails.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with its battery life. My husband and I share this one but with two brush heads. We both use it on a daily basis and sometimes I lost track of how long ago I charged it. I'd say, between two of us, it can last a little over a month without charging it if you use it on the low vibration setting which is the setting we use. It cleans my teeth really well, a lot better than the traditional toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Winnietin

customer_reviews.title: The best toothbrush money can buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sonicare. My previous one lasted a little over 11 years. So, you are getting an excellent product for the money. I was happy with the model upgrades that were done. The older models had rubber around the base of the vibrating tip that you put the toothbrush head on. It used to get moldy after a while and it was hard to clean. The new model doesn't have that and I am happy to report that it is extremely easy to keep clean and mold free! I enjoy the 3 different power setting options and LOVE that "just visited the dentist" clean it provides!
customer_reviews.author: EmmOrr

customer_reviews.title: Simple is good.
customer_reviews.text: This is simpler than my last Sonicare handle (the Healthy White), but I actually like it better! It fits into my hand more comfortably, and I like that there's no silicone on the back of the handle. (It looks cleaner and feels nicer to me.) I am a serious fan of all the Sonicare tooth brushes, but this one is my favorite so far. (It is my third Sonicare handle ... I travel a lot and tend to break them every couple of years.)
customer_reviews.author: Arkansas Mezzo

customer_reviews.title: Solid Electric Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I have now tried quite a few electric toothbrushes and I must say this is the best. The head is small and therefore it can easily reach my wisdom teeth without any fuss, the vibrations seem to be doing a good job of getting in between my teeth and I love the feature that the tooth brush turn off after a period of time telling you that you have done enough brushing. I would, however, say that the three speed settings are gimmicky, I can't really work out when I will need to change the speed, as such the older version of this toothbrush I imagine will do the trick just as well, but may not cost you as much.
customer_reviews.author: Space

customer_reviews.title: This is very different from using the traditional electric toothbrush ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very different from using the traditional electric toothbrush that has the round brush. A very different sound too. It works well and I think is doing a decent job. Would most likely buy the other variety, should this one break.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.S.N.

customer_reviews.title: So clean!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth feel sooooo clean! It has a small brush head and I love it but I’ve attached a photo comparing it to the kids size. Kids size is on the left and adult is on the right
customer_reviews.author: Lakopp

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush in the end of October 2017. It broke in February 2019. So it lasted just 1year 4 month. It stopped charging first. Then I was able to charge it somehow but vibrations are very weak now. Buy from more reliable brand than Philips.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Ivanova

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my fiance's older electric toothbrush. This one has more setting than the other ones. He loves this one over his old one. It came with a travel case, which was nice. His last one had a space where mold could build up. This one doesn't have the space, so no more mold issue! He also loves that the toothbrush makes a beep when you are supposed to move to another area of your mouth. Wasn't sure if I wanted to spend this type of money on a toothbrush, but I am so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: I live on a very limited income. This investment was big for me. Been using for about 3 weeks now and my gums are healthier than they have ever been, color restored and not bleeding from gums. Also teeth are cleaner now than after a dental cleaning. Wish I found this product years ago. Of all investments , this one is the best for overall health , believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Jymi Miner

customer_reviews.title: Terrific model for worldwide travelling.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific in all respects. Used it on my recent China trip and had no problems charging it on both 110/220, Been using Philips Sonicare electric toothbrushes for 2+ years now and noticed improvement in gum health and clean teeth. My longtime Dental Hygienist remarked on the noticeable improvement over standard brush cleaning/.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Too wimpy and irritating.
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a negative review before, but I've never been so disappointed in a product before. I had an Oral B for years and was ready for a replacement. I saw the Black Friday deal on this and bit. The Oral B goes around with a rather substantial round brush. This one just goes back and forth with a little wimpy brush. I could deal with that, even though it didn't feel like it was doing much good, but when that back and forth motion hit my other teeth with the back of the brush, it was reminiscent of the old dentist drills. (Think jackhammer) I use the past tense, "was", because it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very large but easy and works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest toothbrush I have ever used, but it works well and is easy to use. I appreciate the little buzz after 30 seconds so you can be sure to get all four quadrants of your mouth before it shuts off after 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived defective. I placed it on the charger (following the instructions) and the light kept flashing. I went to use it and upon pushing the power button MULTIPLE TIMES, it never turned on. I thought I was doing something wrong and tried again over three days and it never powered on. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: but I gave this one a try after the dentist recommended I switch
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would use an electric toothbrush, but I gave this one a try after the dentist recommended I switch. Man, I don't know why I never tried one earlier! This brush is easy to use and leaves my teeth feeling clean. I like the timer feature so I spend the recommended amount of time brushing and spend the same amount of time on each section of the mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Will Never Go Back To Regular Toothbrush & WELL With The $.
customer_reviews.text: I'Ve been using one for over a year and love it. My wife, who was just diagnosed with gum disease, was advised to use the Soniccare. She has used for a week and is already raving about it. Leaves your teeth feeling as clean as when you have your teeth professionally cleaned. At first it tickles, but you do get using a couple of times. Will never go back to regular tooth brush!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GSA2k

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This product was great in the beginning, felt my teeth were cleaner than when using a manual tooth brush. However it did not last. Only ordered replacement heads (3 pack) once and already it no longer functions. Appears to hold a charge, lights come on and I hear it, but head does not vibrate. The fit of the head on the handle is not good, leaving a gap which allows water and deposits to collect. Although I’ve cleaned this off, it makes no difference. A brush of this price should last longer, not the quality I expected. Is this really a throw away item at over a $100?
customer_reviews.author: rochford r.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush! My old E series model died on Christmas night. I liked that one a lot, so decided to upgrade to the new model. This design is far superior than the old design! The head fits securely & doesn't "rattle" like the E series head did if I didn't screw it on tight enough. I love the adjustable settings. And the battery life is amazing! Love the low profile charging station as well.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Tried one many years ago, and was not fond of it! This one has been simplified and is easy to use. I was shocked to feel how clean my teeth are (and just went for my cleaning last week)! My dentist has been requesting that I purchase one for years as I do have some problems with my gums.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I love the quad pacing feature - you never realize that ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this sonicare to replace a brush I had got from my dentist ( I had paid more for the model from the dentist). This brush has saved my gum line! I love the quad pacing feature - you never realize that you favor a side or haven't brushed evenly until using a quad pacer. It pauses every time you need to move to a new section. I have taken my brush on a trip and it lasted 4 days without recharging. Overall, very pleased! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY GIANT GAP
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design !!! There is a giant gap between the tooth brush head and the battery. It does not seal shut so it always wiggles out and does not work. Got it out of the box and always falls out. clearly manipulating a manipulated algorithm that bumps them up to the top and doesn’t show how bad it is. DO NOT TRUST THE PICTURES THERE A GIANT GAP
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: Battery is still good for 2 weeks of brushing between charges
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a year. Battery is still good for 2 weeks of brushing between charges. My dentist noticed my gums are actually healthier :) It’s somewhat buzzy in my ear, so I can’t hear when my wife is trying to talk to me while I use it. Use that information for what you will. I picked it because all the more expensive ones seem like useless bells and whistles while the cheaper ones have sacrifices to battery life and/or functionality and effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moomey

customer_reviews.title: This brush is pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and quiet compared to my old Oral-B Vitality brush. The battery life is fantastic, the 3 strength levels also make it very nice, when you don't want all the power that this brush has to offer, for whatever reason. I haven't tried the series 2, but was considering it when looking for a new brush. Between the series 2 and the series 3 (this one), I figured that the extra options would be worth the extra bit of money. I'm glad I made that decision.
customer_reviews.author: Lior

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush and great price point
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the best price point for jumping into the electric toothbrush world. This electric brush is superior to the cheap ones you can get in the supermarket. It actually feels like your teeth are getting clean rather than just a toothbrush that vibrates. The description I would use is my teeth feel polished after I use it. Convenience is added with the travel case and the long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Fifa

customer_reviews.title: I've been using mine for about two months and my teeth and gums are in good shape. I went to the dentist recently and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't waited so long to finally get a Sonicare brush. I've been using mine for about two months and my teeth and gums are in good shape. I went to the dentist for a root canal not long after I got the Sonicare. The dentist was happy with how well everything healed up by the third and final appointment. Yeah it was not fun, but I think the Sonicare has already made a difference in my dental health.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Game changer to my dental hygiene
customer_reviews.text: Using this feels like a dental cleaning, your teeth feel so smooth afterwards. I have a bit of a phobia of dentists and hadn't been in 4 years...I bought this in preparation and used it for 3 months before making an appointment. I anticipated having cavities but to my surprise they said I had none! I now get complimented every dental cleaning on how healthy my gums are. Never going back to manual toothbrushes again. One warning -- be gentle with brushing, I noticed some gum recession from pressing too hard (which I had been doing with manual toothbrushes as well). A light circular motion is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: For once the upgrade is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Ended up liking this better than I thought I would. I had to bite the bullet on the price because I always use the timer. There are subtle improvements over my old one (probably ten years old, guess I got my money's worth) and the new brush head is clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Bart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Sonicare is easy to use and to charge. I travel quite a bit, so the travel case is very nice. After using, my teeth feel like they do after i have had a professional cleaning at the dentist. I still have to floss due to plaque in between my teeth, but I feel that this toothbrush is helping me to keep my teeth and gums cleaner and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sonicare HX6631/02 3 Series Gum Health
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointing. I read the reviews about the head rattling. I thought I would try it anyway, hoping it wouldn't happen to me. Just like the reviews stated, it rattles, like the head doesn't fit properly. I tried different heads, but the same rattle. It just feels and sounds cheap. I should stay with my older screw on style head. I was just trying to get away from the nooks and crannies of the older style that got kind of grungy. My wife bought the Healthy White Series 5 and it sounds fine.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: It actually got worse after I visited the dentist
customer_reviews.text: I went to the dentist after I thought I had a cavity, but turns out my gums were exposed and therefore more sensitive. It actually got worse after I visited the dentist, but they did advise me to maybe invest in a better toothbrush. After reading reviews, I came upon this toothbrush, and it is amazing. I definitely recommend for people with gum sensitivity. After a month of using it, my gums are definitely less sensitive. Also, it cleans your teeth very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great electric toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: My old electric toothbrush finally quit. My dentist noticed teeth were not as clean as before and recommended I get back to using one. This one works great. Works quite a while on a single charge. Teeth feel super clean after brushing. I am very happy with this toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old Oral-B
customer_reviews.text: I used to use an Oral-B electric toothbrush for years but unfortunately I think the rapid spinning of the brush head, like an electric sander, contributed to my gum loss. I stopped using the electric toothbrush for a few years but my dentist recommended a Sonicare. I finally purchased one and I much prefer the motion of the Sonicare. My teeth feel nice and clean and fresh after using it and it feels like it's safer for my gums. So far I'm very pleased with the toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: blueIslandsea

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: This Phillips Sonicare 3 electric toothbrush works as well as the Diamond Care version my husband bought for four times the price. It leaves my teeth feeling much cleaner than a manual toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: sjwgoodwin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only lasts a little over a year and then you have to replace. I've had to replace 2 already.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Better than a $20 toothbrush, but more delicate
customer_reviews.text: Was okay when it was working, but 7 months in the thing wont charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kacafony

customer_reviews.title: Feeling clean
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Talk about clean!! This brush has it all. Different vibration settings, a long battery life and leaves you with a deep clean feeling. I got it after Black Friday and have only charged it once since then! The charge has lasted over a month! (I use it 2-3 times a day too). Definitely recommend Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Clean teeth feel good.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly charge this thing every couple of weeks my teeth feel very clean the brush holds up as long as a regular toothbrush the timer feature keeps me from over brushing as I sometimes do with my manual brush. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Vvvvvvery vvvvibratey
customer_reviews.text: First time you try an electric toothbrush you will think you've made a terrible mistake. Very uncomfortable. But you adjust quickly and it guilts you into spending 2 minutes brushing, which is a good thing. It's solid.
customer_reviews.author: justmytwocents

customer_reviews.title: Quality is awful!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this Sonicare is awful now. I had my original Sonicare for 5 years or so. This thing is dying on the 9th month of having it. The button has disintegrated and the unit will turn on and off by itself and stay in for a full cycle of not longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gum Brush Head works great and 3 speeds too.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the basic model for a couple of years and wanted to upgrade... Should have done this a long time ago... I really like the 3 speeds and the Gum Brush Head... Gums feel great... Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Works like all others, but the head is large for my mouth.
customer_reviews.text: Like the brush, works like the others with the timer at 30 seconds. It is heavy duty. Wish there was a smaller head for it. And I am having a hard time figuring out which brush replacements are the softest and smallest.
customer_reviews.author: Joat90066

customer_reviews.title: Excellent entry level electric toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10yr old daughter to introduce her to the world of electric toothbrushes. She loves it, and it’s teaching her excellent dental habits. I personally use a higher grade Sonicare product for myself, but this one is awesome for the price. It still beeps every 30 seconds, versus some cheaper models that do not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Torres

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Electric Toothbrush. Makes the more expensive models seem pointless.
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush, I did a fair bit of research on which toothbrush to buy. I figured out there is NO need to buy the expensive fancier toothbrushes as they ALL oscillate at the same speed! This will do just as good a job as the more expensive Sonicare series brushes at less than half the price. Highly recommend this toothbrush. Simple 3 speeds plus an automatic 2 minute timer with 30 second interval warnings.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Vreugdenburg

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my 8+ year old sonicare which finally but the proverbial dust. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and it is definitely an upgrade from my “vintage”. I’ll have to revise once I’ve had my dental checkup re: the gum care... So far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: K.Nejdl

customer_reviews.title: This newer model is just as good as the original one
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous generation of this toothbrush that the power switch finally gave out on. This newer model is just as good as the original one. It holds a charge for a long time (so I don't need to lug the charger with me on short trips), and is quite powerful. I like the travel case that was included with this newer model too.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My teeth and gums are very happy!!!!! I was using a different brand and it was good, but his is way better. My teeth are cleaner and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth West

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: What's there to say? Most incredible toothbrush anyone's ever created. My dentist recommended it, and offered to sell me one. I told him I'd rather get it on Amazon, and I did. At first, using this thing is bizarre, like your whole brain is vibrating. After you get used to it though, you'll never want to brush your teeth the old fashioned way again. You know how walking normally feels strange after you get off a treadmill? Brushing normally feels that way after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I’ve ever owned. Dentist was right.
customer_reviews.text: Best brush myself or my wife have ever used. Massages, cleans, whitens. 3 settings. Vibrates to tell you when to move quadrants while brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Have had good results with previous Sonicare products. This is a nice step up. Works well; good battery life. No problems out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Bop

customer_reviews.title: Great buy on first electric toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how much cleaner my teeth feel after using this toothbrush. Convinced my wife to buy one and she loves it also.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fresh feeling after using.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this years ago. I love that it has a travel case and I can charge it before a 3 week vacation and not bring the power cord with me on my trip.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: The best one I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no connoisseur of electric toothbrushes, but I find this to be great. It's got a nice sturdy feel to it while being slim enough to hold easily, works flawlessly and goes for a long time on a single charge. The charger is nice and compact and the brush head comes off easily, making it easy to take with you while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: If you want clean teeth then buy this. Excellent for the gums.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for years. They do wear out eventually. They are well made and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hollins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: My other sonicare took 2 weeks to gently come up to speed so it woudn't shock my gums and make them bleed. This model comes ready to roll at full speed which is great. It is also programmable to start at a lower/gentler speed for beginning ultrasonic brushers.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: The Best yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric toothbrush I have ever used. I have used many different brands and types of electric brushes over the years. This one is the first to actually deliver on it's promises. The replacement brushes may seem a bit pricey, but the benefits of better dental health far outweigh the cost.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caron

customer_reviews.title: ... 6 months now and teeth are much cleaner and like the fact that it runs for 2 minutes and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 6 months now and teeth are much cleaner and like the fact that it runs for 2 minutes and shuts off. Great product, actually look forward to seeing the dentist and hygienist this visit!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a gentle massage.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hurt my gums. Teeth feel clean. I like that the brush is small. Better than oral B.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Aiken

customer_reviews.title: im very happy with the sonicare
customer_reviews.text: teeth feel very clean after using this thing. i had an older electric for years and finally replaced it. im very happy with the sonicare. I am also very happy with the two min timer. i think i would brush off the enamel if it didnt time me.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush to address my swollen gums
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush to address my swollen gums...definitely have seen an improvement in decrease swelling and bleeding. The 3 speeds are nice as well and the timed indicator as you brushing helps to make sure you stay on track with brushing your teeth in the proper amount of time. I'm glad I purchased this toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: OwlLuvah

customer_reviews.title: No longer works after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The green button wears down, and the replacement heads do not stay attached anymore. It was a good product for a while, but I will not purchase again becuase it has no longevity. When it worked, I would give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these about 8 months ago and have been very happy with the purchase. No issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive Sonics which is great for travel as it holds charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Harry E

customer_reviews.title: Love the Clean Feeling
customer_reviews.text: Makes my mouth feel very clean — even better than after the dentist! I love the quad timer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: This Series 3 is the perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.text: After reading tons of blogs on the different Sonicare's on the market I decided on the Sonicare 3. It has just enough of everything that you need in a Sonicare and you aren't paying an arm and a leg for extra things you don't need. I had an older model before but after years of use the battery finally died and it was obsolete so I wasn't able to replace it. This Series 3 is the perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush, highly recommend the philips brand. Great price from this seller. Fast delivery. Will definitely do business with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for nine months. Now it will not charge. $60 divided by 9 = $6.66 a month.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Age of the Philips Sonicare Received
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the actual product I received works fine, however it is dated. Evidence: The coupons that were in the box expired in December 2017 and the cover for the toothbrush was the old one that went away by the manufacturer over a year ago. As long as the battery holds up I will be satisfied, however.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Auld

customer_reviews.title: Finally smooth teeth
customer_reviews.text: Every day I now have that "post dentist clean" feeling on my teeth and it's so far been great. I've had rough teeth and bad gums for some time now and this seems to be doing that trick that a regular brush couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Newer is not always better.
customer_reviews.text: After using Sonicate for years, this model is much lighter weight and tips over easily. Does not have a high quality heavy duty feel. Because the body is mostly white it is difficult to keep clean. I like the new bristle size and it does a good job timing and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product- finally made the switch the an electric brush. My only complaint: the first batter charge lasts FOREVER (like 2 months), and then after they only last a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Howard

customer_reviews.title: My teeth feel clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush. It's a life changer. Recommended by my dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best electric toothbrush period!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Sonicare toothbrushes for years. They are the best. Tried other electric toothbrushes and was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: the charge is lasting like x5 times longer than my cheap old oral-b brush
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for over a month now, the charge is lasting like x5 times longer than my cheap old oral-b brush. Cleaning seems to be good as well, even tho I feel oral-b might be slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed that it only lasted one year. It seems to work well when it's working.
customer_reviews.author: Alynn

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old gen Sonicare with this one. Holds charge much better and has a higher intensity setting. Heads are cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; teeth & gums feel cleaner; holds long charge
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; teeth & gums feel cleaner; holds long charge. I recommend this electric toothbrush. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Price

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome features. I love the 3 different settings, the light that lets you know it needs to be charged, it lasts 3 weeks without charging and the travel case. The 2 minute timer is also a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent plaque removal
customer_reviews.text: My gums are tighter against my teeth - and my teeth cleaner overall - with daily use of this toothbrush. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aston Willis

customer_reviews.title: Nice toothbrush, but the vibration is a bit weak ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice toothbrush, but the vibration is a bit weak compared to the one I had before. Not sure if defective.
customer_reviews.author: MinJae

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Was skeptical for some time switching from a regular brush. This thing is life changing, wished we would have switched many years ago. No issues with product
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: A great tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: A great tooth brush. Use it the two minutes as recommended and I bet your cleaning and dental appointments will go much better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Bloome

customer_reviews.title: Strong and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have found this on line with Amazon. I tried one before and it was not as strong, did not clean as well, and seemed to have very little power. This model is great!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Zamsky

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it, but says it was a little harsher than she expected at first. She now never uses a manual toothbrush because they don't make her teeth feel clean like this does.
customer_reviews.author: Kenobi-San

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush! I love that it makes a noise to indicate when you should switch to another part of your mouth. Leave my teeth feeling very clean! I would definitely recommend trying this one!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Clean teeth, healthy gums
customer_reviews.text: Been using one of these for years, and just bought one for my dad for his birthday. It's like a dentist's clean ever day. My dentist told me to get this brand, and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Great for tooth and gum health!
customer_reviews.text: Always very happy with sonic result for gum health, will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is light and powerful. It comes with a wonderful hard little travel box.
customer_reviews.author: William Eldrich

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced a more expensive model after many years of use and this seems to be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

product_meta.title: Philips Sonicare 3 Series gum health rechargeable electric toothbrush, HX6631
product_meta.description: Color:Persian GreenImprove your gum health up to 100% better than a manual toothbrush with the Philips Sonicare 3 Series gum health rechargeable electric toothbrush. The ergonomic, easy-to-grip handle has three settings for greater comfort. The brush head features a cup-shaped profile to deliver a gentle and even clean for your teeth and gums. Blue reminder bristles signal when it’s time to replace the brush head, and the snap-on design makes it easy to switch it out. The Quadpacer and Smartimer features assure you brush adequately and evenly, and a two-color battery charge indicator lets you know when it’s time to recharge the battery. This kit includes 1 Philips Sonicare rechargeable toothbrush, 1 ProResults gum health brush head, 1 charger, and 1 travel case.
feature_bullets: The most loved rechargeable electric toothbrush brand by Americans and their dentists
Improves gum health up to 100 percent better than a manual toothbrush
Removes up to 6x more plaque along the gumline vs. a manual toothbrush
Three intensity settings for a gentle and comfortable brushing experience
Patented sonic technology delivers up to 31,000 brush strokes per minute
